carousel.dlearnOrigin: D-LEARN (LEarning software ARchitecture fundameNtals) Board game is a digital game inspired by the non-digital game LEARN Board game, which is a game that uses cards and a board to assist in teaching Software Architecture.
carousel.dlearnGoals: D-LEARN was created to address some challenges faced by the current non-digital format game, such as the use of paper for its construction, difficulty in making changes to the game dynamics, and a high amount of time/effort to create a new version with new rules, for example.

cards.title: cards
cards.subtitle: The cards are of quality attributes, architectural patterns, architectural decisions, and luck or setback.

ranking.subtitle: At the end of each game, we store the game log on our servers to encourage players to seek the top of the ranking.
